pkmkdoc.description: This package lets you install the required files and folders that Xcode need to create new Objective-J classes and categories.

choice.title: Objective-J Category
choice.description: This component installs a Objective-J category file template.

choice.title: Objective-J Classes
choice.description: This component installs a set of Objective-J class file templates.

requirement.message: It seems that you haven't a valid Xcode version installed. On Xcode v4.3 and above the Xcode application bundle will be no longer installed in "/Developer" but directly into the "/Applications" folder.
